page.title: 05TRAFFIC AT BOROUGH GREEN
page.content: We did two {traffic} counts on the old {toll road} that runs through Borough Green, one outside our school, and the other outside the {Bus Station}. The {traffic} count outside school was in the mid-morning, and the other was in the mid-afternoon. Each was for one hour. These are the numbers of vehicles that passed. OUTSIDE SCHOOL(going North or South):-cars...291 vans...38 lorries...56 long vehicle...5 tankers.7 buses...2 motorbikes...6 mopeds...2. OUTSIDE THE BUS STATION(going East or West):- cars...224 vans...42 lorries... 46 long vehicles...l5 buses...7 coaches ...5 mopeds...3 motorbikes...6. In both counts we only saw eleven bicycles, ten jeeps and Landrovers, and six trailers. (by A.Cunningham,L.Pugh,
